atbat.des: Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, shortstop J. Hardy to first baseman Derrek Lee.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Darnell McDonald replaces J. Drew.

pitch.cc: Michael Gonzalez is trying to tie up Darnell McDonald with fastballs inside, where Darnell McDonald hits .250.

atbat.des: Marco Scutaro singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones. Darnell McDonald to 2nd.
Jacoby Ellsbury walks. Darnell McDonald to 3rd. Marco Scutaro to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Michael Gonzalez went back to the four-seam fastball even though Jacoby Ellsbury hit for a single last time up.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Mark Worrell replaces Michael Gonzalez.

atbat.des: Dustin Pedroia doubles (22) on a fly ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Darnell McDonald scores. Marco Scutaro scores. Jacoby Ellsbury to 3rd.

atbat.des: Mark Worrell intentionally walks Adrian Gonzalez.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Chris Jakubauskas replaces Mark Worrell.

atbat.des: Carl Crawford singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Adrian Gonzalez scores. Kevin Youkilis to 3rd. Josh Reddick to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Chris Jakubauskas went back to the four-seam fastball even though Jarrod Saltalamacchia hit for a home run last time up.

atbat.des: Darnell McDonald doubles (3) on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Felix Pie. Kevin Youkilis scores. Josh Reddick scores. Carl Crawford scores.

pitch.cc: Chris Jakubauskas shows faith in Matt Wieters by throwing the curveball in the dirt.
Chris Jakubauskas had Darnell McDonald down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Marco Scutaro flies out to right fielder Nick Markakis.

pitch.cc: Chris Jakubauskas is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Chris Guccione.

action.des: Darnell McDonald remains in the game as the right fielder.

atbat.des: Nolan Reimold flies out to left fielder Carl Crawford.
